data.message: Actually, the scarcity which must be created is "ad units" per page. The google adsense / fb mktplace  type of multiple ads per page is creating page view inflation and hence reducing price per unit.  The issue of "viewed" vs "non viewed" is not that important, as the % discrepancy can simply be effected into the CPM pricing. (its like carpet area  vs super built up in real estate).

Scarcity isn't a bad thing when it comes to online advertising. Our new whitepaper "The Economics of Online Advertising" explores how the shift to viewable impressions can benefit all parties involved. http://ow.ly/d0Qx3
